There is never such a thing as one law for muslim and another law for non. Sooner or later extremist will force to make one law more superior and create another Isis. But of course people like pas supporters would love that outcome.

RUU335 only made the punishment under Syariah Law harsher. What considered as crime under Syariah Law and how it was enforced still same like right now. Stuff /k complained about the motion is actually about the Syariah Law (which is already in effect with or without ruu335), not the motion itself.

People talking about the overall effect that can propagate to more ridiculous syariah law that will encroach non-muslim rights directly or indirectly, you people keep dialing back to "Oh but it only affect muslims" nonsense. If you want to punish evil doers, there is already civil law in place so why the need for another law.
